Value: # Size is measures used with Figures, height for bipeds, length for quadripeds

Description: Pixy sized or smaller creature, under 1.5 foot in size
Dwarf sized creature, approximately 2-4 foot in size
Human sized creature, approximately 5-8 feet in size
Ogre sized creature, approximately 9-16 feet in size
Giant sized creature, approximately 17-32 feet in size
Titan/Dragon sized creature, over 33 feet in size
